Discover Local Artisans & Vendors

Mercado Bahía Ballena, Uvita

The Mercado Bahía Ballena represents the heart of local commerce and craftsmanship in Costa Rica's Southern Zone. This vibrant marketplace brings together artisans, farmers, and entrepreneurs who showcase the region's diverse talents and products.

Each vendor at the Mercado Bahía Ballena offers unique products that reflect the rich cultural heritage and natural bounty of Costa Rica. From handcrafted hot sauces made with local peppers to exquisite Brazilian-inspired jewelry, the market presents authentic treasures you won't find anywhere else.

Featured Vendors

LA FINCA PZ Hot Sauces

Artisanal hot sauces crafted with local ingredients
Nilson's Brazilian Jewelry

Handcrafted jewelry with Brazilian inspiration
Mariscos Jomar

Fresh locally-caught seafood from Costa Rica's Pacific Coast

Visiting the Market

The Mercado Bahía Ballena welcomes visitors throughout the week, offering a glimpse into the local community and culture. Whether you're searching for unique souvenirs, delicious local foods, or simply want to experience the authentic atmosphere of a Costa Rican market, Mercado Bahía Ballena provides a welcoming environment to explore and discover.

Take your time to wander through the stalls, chat with the vendors, and learn about their crafts and products. The market is not just a place to shop—it's an experience that connects you to the people and traditions of Costa Rica's Southern Zone.
